description:
Initialize ScrollEvent offsets for ET_SCROLL_FLING_CANCEL

And app list should not process ET_SCROLL_FLING_CANCEL in its scroll event handler.

BUG=162125
TEST=Verify no unexpected scrolling in app list.

R=sky@chromium.org

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=170391

messages.text:
We create a ScrollEvent for ET_SCROLL_FLING_CANCEL but not initialize the offsets member. This in turn triggers a bug in app list that causes unexpected scrolling.

This CL initializes offsets for ET_SCROLL_FLING_CANCEL (basically set them to 0). And app list only handles ET_SCROLL for touchpad scrolling.

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/xiyuan@chromium.org/11419214/3001

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/xiyuan@chromium.org/11419214/3001

subject: Initialize ScrollEvent offsets for ET_SCROLL_FLING_CANCEL
